thread.title: Brett Ratten, Luke Hodge travel with Hawthorn to Launceston, but no Sam Mitchell or Brendon Bolton
thread.title_full: Brett Ratten, Luke Hodge travel with Hawthorn to Launceston, but no Sam Mitchell or Brendon Bolton

title: Brett Ratten, Luke Hodge travel with Hawthorn to Launceston, but no Sam Mitchell or Brendon Bolton
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Brett Ratten, Luke Hodge travel with ... Brett Ratten, Luke Hodge travel with Hawthorn to Launceston, but no Sam Mitchell or Brendon Bolton 1 hr ago Read more: Sydney Morning Herald 
It's one former Carlton coach in, one future Blues coach out at Hawthorn, with assistant coach Brett Ratten a surprise arrival at Melbourne Airport on Friday, travelling with son Tanner to Launceston for the reigning premiers' clash with the Brisbane Lions after returning to work on Thursday following the death of his eldest son, 16-year-old Cooper. However there was no sign of Sam Mitchell, with coach Hawks Alastair Clarkson saying the star midfielder "more unlikely than likely" to play after falling ill on Thursday. Start the conversation, or Read more at Sydney Morning Herald.
